TunableEnum.name: DINER_SITUATION_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The situation tag to determine whether the situation is diner situation.

TunableEnum.name: DINING_SPOT_OBJECT_TEST_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The enum tag to identify required object test in venue tuning for the dining spot.

TunableEnum.name: RECIPE_DRINK_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The recipe tag to determine if this recipe is drink recipe.

TunableEnum.name: RECIPE_FOOD_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The recipe tag to determine if this recipe is food recipe.
